title: Riot can you stop demoting me please?
body: is it just me or does this only ever happen in your series? if it's not this, it's the UI glitch where you can't see your action bar. please rito, give me some LP back or fix this asap. i have tried the new beta client as well as the legacy client. i've also done a repair install. i have additionally reinstalled the game. help me.

replies.body:
Since you're getting that "LoLClient not responding" error, it's pretty likely that something is going on with the league installation itself. That error is popping up due to something causing the league program to crash completely. 

You mentioned that you had tried reinstalling already, but let's be sure to hit the rest of the steps in this [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) so that we cover all our bases.

http://imgur.com/a/ciQ4W

hey guess what? the client worked just fine after yet another install for most of my games and it froze in my do or die series for gold YET AGAIN. it legitimately will not allow me to advance to gold. this is a serious problem. it is the same series promotion game and it's in champion select yet again. same exact problem. seriously. i want a refund of all RP spent or some LP restored or something because this is legitimately not acceptable. for the most played game in the entire world, you guys seem to have a stellar system of operations here.

i have updated all graphics drivers, as well as reinstalled active X, etc. i have taken every fix known to man. what is the deal and why am i being singled out?

Since the steps in that guide weren't able to help at all, your main issue might lie outside of league entirely. It's pretty clear from that error that the client itself is crashing, which could be caused by something outside of the program as well. Go ahead and hit up our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll be able to take a much closer look with you at what's going on.

Also, since you mentioned that you keep trying to play series matches, it might be a good first step to start trying any changes in a custom game so that you don't run into this crash again in a promo.

i am opening a ticket, but it only happens when i have 2 losses and i am in the series to the next ladder IE silver to gold in this instance. if the tech team establishes that there is no issue or if they "resolve" the issue and it persists, what steps will be taken? i am moving from an attitude of hostility and simply one of genuine concern.

Sometimes it might take a little back and forth, but I have not once personally seen our tech guys solve out any issues without first getting you back into the game while you're with them. It may take a little back and forth, but that's only because they need to troubleshoot a little before they're able to figure out exactly what is causing this problem. 

Also, our ticket system is set up to auto solve a ticket if there haven't been any responses in 3 days. What that means is, if you miss the response from them it could auto solve. With that being said, you can simply respond to the "solved" ticket and it will reopen it (I believe with the exact same agent). 

I know these kinds of things can be _**immensely**_ frustrating, especially if you feel like we aren't helping. But I really do appreciate you taking the time to give us another chance! Rest assured that, with enough time and effort, we will get you back in the game.
I've had this same thing happen in one of my series as well... only time... one word to describe this... suspicious. Forever in silver...
